name: SDC00001
notes: Demolition of existing industrial and commercial buildings and 2 no. flats; construction of 4 no. houses and 3 no. flats together with creation of new vehicular access, parking area, gardens, erection of new boundary treatments to Redditch Road and installation of biomass district heating system

name: SDC00002
notes: Demolition of existing dwelling and erection of 3no. detached dwellings

name: SDC00003
notes: Demolition of existing farm buildings and removal of mobile home. Proposed redevelopment of site for up to 7no. dwellings with new access arrangements and associated works. Outline application with all matters reserved.

name: SDC00004
notes: Proposed conversion of upper floors at 18 High Street (Marlowes Restaurant) to 7 no. 1 and 2 bedroom studio flats

name: SDC00005
notes: Conversion of house to 6 flats with an infill extension under the existing front canopy and the addition of 2no. front dormer windows and a rear box dormer. Widening of the existing access and provision of 6no. parking spaces.

name: SDC00006
notes: Change of use of Public House to residential use and creation of 6 units. Construction of first floor rear extension/ two storey rear extension and associated car parking.

name: SDC00007
notes: Demolition of existing building and construction of new building to provide 7no. apartments (revised scheme to that approved previously)

name: SDC00008
notes: Conversion of former convent building to provide eleven residential units including the provision of new pitched roofs over part of the existing building, part two storey front extension; single storey rear infill extension and other associated works

name: SDC00009
notes: Demolition of existing garden centre buildings and dwelling and erection of 12 new dwellings

name: SDC00010
notes: Demolition of existing building and erection of no.4, 1 bed townhouses and no.2, 1 bed bungalows for adults with learning disabilities.

name: SDC00011
notes: Conversion of and alterations to Class C2 Care Home, erection of first floor and ground floor extensions and demolition of part of rear extension to create 10 no. flats, extension of rear car parking area and provision of cycle and bin stores.

name: SDC00012
notes: Conversion of listed farmhouse to 2 dwellings.

name: SDC00013
notes: Demolition of existing workshops and the erection of 8no. detached dwellings.

name: SDC00014
notes: Demolition of garage and workshop building. Construction of 3 no new dwellings and a detached garage within the grounds of the existing dwelling and new access from Blackwell Road

name: SDC00015
notes: Demolition of existing office building and erection of 5no. dwellings with associated parking and landscaping

name: SDC00016
notes: Proposed change of use of existing short term holiday accommodation to form 7 two bedroom apartments with associated works to the front elevation, the provision of 7 parking spaces and associated refuse storage facilities

name: SDC00017
notes: Change of use from office (use class B1) to 5 residential units (use class C3).

name: SDC00018
notes: Proposed sub-division of existing single dwelling into two dwellings and associated sub-division of south garden

name: SDC00019
notes: Demolition of existing buildings, construction of a two-storey residential building containing 6 no. flats and associated parking and landscaping.

name: SDC00020
notes: Change of use of existing offices (B1a) to create 42 new dwellings (C3)

name: SDC00021
notes: Demolition of former fire station and erection of 6, one bedroomed apartments with management for supported living (C3 use).

name: SDC00022
notes: Proposed replacement dwelling and proposed new dwelling.

name: SDC00023
notes: Proposed reclamation and redevelopment of derelict site to provide mixed use development.

name: SDC00024
notes: The construction of Class C3 dwellinghouses, together with public/amenity open space, structural landscaping and means of access (All matters reserved except for access).

name: SDC00025
notes: Phase 3B comprising erection of 116 residential dwellings

name: SDC00026
notes: Removal of existing commercial buildings and erection of 4 dwellings and B1 office building

name: SDC00027
notes: Outline planning application for a mixed use development comprising the erection of up to 200 dwellings (Use class C3),

name: SDC00028
notes: Erection of up to 80 dwellings with associated public open space and play facilities, access, drainage, infrastructure and parking.

name: SDC00029
notes: Outline application for the demolition of an existing Health Centre (D1 Use) and construction of 9 apartments (C3 Use) with all matters reserved.

name: SDC00030
notes: Outline application for the development of up to 24 dwellings including retention of existing Station House

name: SDC00031
notes: Outline planning application with means of site access from Well Lane to be determined (internal access, layout, scale, appearance and landscaping reserved for subsequent approval) for the demolition of existing slaughterhouse buildings, erection of up to 18 dwellings (Class C3), garages, new footpaths, stairs, resurfacing of public footpath SD250 and resurfacing and reduction in size of existing layby and associated development.

name: SDC00032
notes: Outline application (with all matters reserved (access, appearance, landscaping, layout and scale) for future determination) for the erection of up to 400 dwellings (Class C2/C3), up to 4,000m2 employment hub (Class B1(a)-(c)) and a community hub (Class A1-A5/B1(a)/C3/D1/D2).

name: SDC00033
notes: Outline application with all matters reserved except access for the erection of up to five dwellings with access and parking and associated works.

name: SDC00034
notes: Demolition of existing buildings and construction of five dwellings and associated works

name: SDC00035
notes: Outline application (all matters reserved except for access) for the demolition of garage workshop and erection of 5no. dwellinghouses

name: SDC00036
notes: Outline Planning Application (with means of access) for the development of up to 550 dwellings for whole site, this phase to consist of 149 dwellings

name: SDC00037
notes: Outline Planning Application (with means of access) for the development of up to 550 dwellings for whole site. This Phase to consist of 118 dwellings (Plots 1-118 Meon Vale Phase 4B).
